## Point

### Must coincide with 

```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.cap = "Source: [Link](http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/main/10.2/01mm/pdf/topology_rules_poster.pdf)", fig.cap = "Source: [Link](http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/main/10.2/01mm/pdf/topology_rules_poster.pdf)"}
knitr::include_graphics("images/topology_rules/5_0.jpg")
```

### Must be disjoint

```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.cap = "Source: [Link](http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/main/10.2/01mm/pdf/topology_rules_poster.pdf)"}
knitr::include_graphics("images/topology_rules/5_1.jpg")
```

### Must be covered by endpoint of

```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.cap = "Source: [Link](http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/main/10.2/01mm/pdf/topology_rules_poster.pdf)"}
knitr::include_graphics("images/topology_rules/6_0.jpg")
```

### Point must be covered by line

```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.cap = "Source: [Link](http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/main/10.2/01mm/pdf/topology_rules_poster.pdf)"}
knitr::include_graphics("images/topology_rules/6_1.jpg")
```

### Must be properly inside

```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.cap = "Source: [Link](http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/main/10.2/01mm/pdf/topology_rules_poster.pdf)"}
knitr::include_graphics("images/topology_rules/7_0.jpg")
```

### Must be covered by boundary of

```{r, echo = FALSE, fig.cap = "Source: [Link](http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/main/10.2/01mm/pdf/topology_rules_poster.pdf)"}
knitr::include_graphics("images/topology_rules/7_1.jpg")
```
